name: AgriShield
desc: AgriShield is a deep learning-based pest detection and pesticide suggestion system using image input for accurate farm pest identification and treatment.

name: Edulytics
desc: An AI-powered student performance prediction system that analyzes various factors to predict overall performance. Built using Python, Streamlit, and Random Forest.

name: ApproveX
desc: A loan approval prediction system built using Python and Streamlit. It uses a logistic regression model to predict loan approval status based on user details.

name: Github Profile Finder
desc: Simple frontend project made using HTML/CSS and Javascript to check any user github profile.

name: Voice Translator
desc: A voice translator system for creating the voice translation using Python and Streamlit. It uses Google Text-to-Speech and SpeechRecognition libraries.

name: FWI Prediction using Real Time Data
desc: A system that predicts fire weather index for any city in the world.
